events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will review it shortly.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster due to keywords like software engineer and developer.
A recruiter with experience in engineering hires has been assigned to move forward with the candidate’s process.
The candidate passed the initial screening, demonstrating strong fundamental software engineering knowledge.
The candidate replied promptly and expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity to join our engineering team.
We have scheduled the technical interview for the candidate with the senior development team next week.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, impressing our team with strong problem-solving skills.
Following the technical interview, the HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate’s fit with company culture.
The HR interview was completed positively, with the candidate aligning well with company values and benefits.
An offer has been formally proposed to the candidate, reflecting their skills and experience in software engineering.
The candidate responded to the offer letter with positive feedback and some questions about the benefits package.
The candidate has accepted the offer and is excited to join the engineering team starting next month.
The onboarding process for the new software engineer has started, including setup of accounts and orientation sessions.
The recruitment process is now closed successfully with the candidate integrated into the engineering team.
